C

clear() - Method in class model.ContactList
this method allows to clear the list of contacts of an user
Client - Class in view
this class allows to creat a client, the client to log in at the server, the server must be launch before, the server here is Messagerie_server projet
Client() - Constructor for class view.Client
this is the constructor of the class
close() - Method in class network.Communication
this method allows to close the communication in and out with the server
close() - Method in class network.Receiver
this class allows to close the thread receiver
Communication - Class in network
thos class allows to creat a communication between two client connected by socket or a client and the server
Communication(Socket) - Constructor for class network.Communication
this is the constructor of the class with a socket with parameter
ConnectionListener - Class in network
this method allows to run a thread with the incoming element of the connection with the server
ConnectionListener(Server) - Constructor for class network.ConnectionListener
this is the constructor of the class with a server in parameter
ConnexionStatus - Enum in model
this is the enumeration to know the status of the connection of a client of the server
Contact - Class in model
this class allows to build and manage a Contact, a contact is a corresponding's user extends ContactDto for help to transfert the object or the attribute of the Contact
Contact(int, int, StatusRequest) - Constructor for class model.Contact
this is the constructor of the class with three parameter, users_id, users_friend_id and a status
Contact(int, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Contact
this is the constructor of the class with three parameter, users_id, users_login and users_friend_id
Contact(String, String) - Constructor for class model.Contact
this is the constructor of the class with two parameter user_login and ip
Contact(int, int, String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Contact
this is the constructor of the class with six parameter, id, users_id, user_login, users_friends_id, status, ip
ContactList - Class in model
this class allows to build the class of the list of contacts of an user
ContactList(Collection<Contact>) - Constructor for class model.ContactList
this is the constructor of the classe with one parameter, a list of contact
ContactList() - Constructor for class model.ContactList
this is the constructor of the class without parameter
contains(Object) - Method in class model.ContactList
this method allows to know if a contact is contain in the list
containsAll(Collection<?>) - Method in class model.ContactList
this method allows to know if a list of contact are in the list
